com.vmware.vapi.protocol.server.rpc.http.impl

Class HttpEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.vapi.protocol.server.rpc.http.impl.HttpEndpoint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Endpoint
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HttpsEndpoint

    public class HttpEndpoint
extends Object
implements Endpoint
    Implementation of an HTTP server endpoint.

        public void setAcceptQueueSize(int acceptQueueSize)
        Description copied from interface: Endpoint
        Set number of connection requests that can be queued up before the operating system starts to send rejections.
        Specified by:
        setAcceptQueueSize in interface Endpoint
        Parameters:
        acceptQueueSize - max number of queued requests. Defaults to 0. For the semantics see backlog parameter in ServerSocket.bind(java.net.SocketAddress, int)

      • getMaxIdleTime

        public int getMaxIdleTime()
        Description copied from interface: Endpoint

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        Returns the maxIdleTime.

      • setMaxIdleTime

        public void setMaxIdleTime(int maxIdleTime)
        Description copied from interface: Endpoint
        Set the maximum Idle time for a connection, which roughly translates to the Socket.setSoTimeout(int) call but depends on the application server used and how it is configured. The max idle time is applied:
        • When waiting for a new request to be received on a connection
        • When reading the headers and content of a request
        • When writing the headers and content of a response

        This value MUST be bigger than the keep alive period on the client.

        Default value is 200000 ms

        Specified by:
        setMaxIdleTime in interface Endpoint
        Parameters:
        maxIdleTime - The maxIdleTime to set.

      • getEndpointType

        public Endpoint.EndpointType getEndpointType()
        Description copied from interface: Endpoint
        Get the endpoint connector I/O type.
        Specified by:
        getEndpointType in interface Endpoint
        Returns:
        EndpointType representing the type

      • setEndpointType

        public void setEndpointType(Endpoint.EndpointType type)
        Description copied from interface: Endpoint
        Set the endpoint connector I/O type (like blocking or NIO). Default is Endpoint.EndpointType.BLOCKING.
        Specified by:
        setEndpointType in interface Endpoint
        Parameters:
        type - the I/O type to use
